description:
Fennel is Professor Juniper`s friend who studies the Future Energy and Pokémon dreams. She worked at a laboratory facility near Sanyo City until an accident, caused by a group of men who broke in to the lab, caused its destruction.
Fennel was studying her Musharna until the accident cause it to disappear. Just after Ash defeated Dent and the two of them were at the Sanyo City Pokémon Center, Fennel came rushing in with her Munna and was able to heal Iris`s Kibago.
Fennel returned to the Dream Site ruins where Rocket Gang was attempting to collect the Future Energy. With Ash`s help,
Fennel was able to destroy their mecha and rescue her Musharna which had reappeared at the ruins site.
name: Makomo
